remediation: Upgrade UmbracoCms.Core to version 8.18.10 or higher.
title: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal')

vulnDescription.Overview: UmbracoCms.Core is an ASP.NET CMS. Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') due to insufficient validation of user-supplied input in the package creation functionality. An attacker with permission to create packages can manipulate file paths to write files outside of the intended directory.
